Full Stack Engineer - Payment Systems Lead
Playbypoint · USA (Remote) 2024-07present
Key Achievements & Impact:
- Payment Optimization: Improved payment success rates by 40%, resulting in $500K+ additional annual revenue
- Gateway Integration: Led integration of 10+ payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, Square, etc.) processing $5M+ in transactions
- Performance Enhancement: Reduced payment processing latency from 3s to 800ms, handling 5000+ concurrent transactions
- Fraud Prevention: Implemented 3D Secure 2.0, reducing chargebacks by 65% while maintaining 95% approval rate
- Global Expansion: Enabled expansion to 15 new markets with multi-currency support (25+ currencies)

Technical Leadership:
- Architected microservices-based payment orchestration platform with intelligent routing
- Implemented event-driven architecture for real-time payment tracking and reconciliation
- Built comprehensive payment analytics dashboard improving decision-making by 60%
- Mentored 3 junior developers in payment systems best practices

Technologies:
- Backend: Ruby on Rails, Node.js, GraphQL, REST APIs
